headline: BlackRock and Exxon Just Teamed Up to Rewrite the World's Carbon Rulebook
summary: A powerhouse alliance is building Wall Street--style ledgers to track every ton of CO? on Earth.

headline: Petrobras Cleared to Begin Exploratory Drilling Near Amazon River Mouth
summary: Brazil’s state-run oil giant Petrobras has received approval from environmental regulator Ibama to begin exploratory drilling in the Foz do Amazonas basin

raw.headline: Petrobras Cleared to Begin Exploratory Drilling Near Amazon River Mouth

headline: ExxonMobil Expands Reach With Guyanese Crude Exports to India
summary: XOM expands global footprint as it sells 4 million barrels of Guyanese crude to Indian refiners, marking India's first purchase of new Golden Arrowhead grade amid moves to diversify oil sources.

raw.headline: ExxonMobil Expands Reach With Guyanese Crude Exports to India
raw.summary: XOM expands global footprint as it sells 4 million barrels of Guyanese crude to Indian refiners, marking India's first purchase of new Golden Arrowhead grade amid moves to diversify oil sources.

headline: CleanCapital Completes 3.59 MW Brownfield Solar Project in Buffalo, New York
summary: NEW YORK, October 20, 2025--CleanCapital announces the commercial operation of its newest 3.59 MW brownfield solar project located in downtown Buffalo, New York.

raw.headline: CleanCapital Completes 3.59 MW Brownfield Solar Project in Buffalo, New York
raw.summary: NEW YORK, October 20, 2025--CleanCapital announces the commercial operation of its newest 3.59 MW brownfield solar project located in downtown Buffalo, New York.

headline: Global Coalition Launches to Overhaul Carbon Accounting
summary: A new international alliance led by major industrial and financial players aims to create a unified carbon accounting system to drive emissions reductions through market competition.

raw.headline: Global Coalition Launches to Overhaul Carbon Accounting
raw.summary: A new international alliance led by major industrial and financial players aims to create a unified carbon accounting system to drive emissions reductions through market competition.
